text: (Yaa nyini Annabi)! Yεlima: “N-ku tooi niŋ m maŋ’ anfaani bee chuuta shεli naɣila Naawuni yi yu shεli. Yaha! (Yεlima): “N-yi di mi din sɔɣi, tɔ! N-naan zooi alheeri (arzichi) laɣimbu. Yaha! Din be naan ku tooi shihi ma, m-pa so m-pahila saɣisigulana, ka lahi nyɛ suhupɛlli lahabali tira n-ti ninvuɣu shεba ban ti Naawuni yεlimaŋli.”
